allow_origin_header.description: The value of the `Access-Control-Allow-Origin` header in the response to the gRPC-Web client.

pass_stripped_path.description: If set to `true` causes the plugin to pass the stripped request path to the upstream gRPC service.

proto.description: If present, describes the gRPC types and methods. Required to support payload transcoding. When absent, the web client must use application/grpw-web+proto content.
